mapper.insert: insert into PUBLIC.ALBUM (NUMBEROFSONGS, TITLE, ARTIST_ID) values (#{numberofsongs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artist.id,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select a.ID, a.NUMBEROFSONGS, a.TITLE, a.ARTIST_ID, ar.FIRSTNAME, ar.LASTNAME from PUBLIC.ALBUM a left join PUBLIC.ARTIST ar on a.ARTIST_ID = ar.ID where a.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select a.ID, a.NUMBEROFSONGS, a.TITLE, a.ARTIST_ID, ar.FIRSTNAME, ar.LASTNAME from PUBLIC.ALBUM a left join PUBLIC.ARTIST ar on a.ARTIST_ID = ar.ID
